  </td>
  <td width="9%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.94%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6,488</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">5,400</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">1,088</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.94%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.96%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.4</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.4%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="24%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:24.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Impairment and other charges</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.94%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2,503</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" colspan="2" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&#151;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">2,503</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.94%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">N/M</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.96%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.3</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.0</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.4%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="24%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:24.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:8.44%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">28,225</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:8.42%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19,991</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:8.42%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8,234</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.94%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">41.2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.96%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36.3</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 1.5pt .7pt;width:2.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#162;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">33.7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 1.5pt .7pt;width:1.4%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#162;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During fiscal 2006, wages and benefits
increased due to changes in the workers&#146; compensation coverage and the addition
of 44 new pilots and customer service agents due to new service offerings.&#160; In fiscal 2006, Big Sky paid actual claims
compared to having claims covered by insurance in fiscal 2005.&#160; In fiscal 2005, Big Sky recorded a reserve
for remaining open workers&#146; compensation claims from the previous policy
period.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft fuel represented the largest expense
increase, 95.3%, from fiscal 2005 to fiscal 2006.&#160; The number of gallons of fuel burned
increased approximately 70% due to added flight hours and the Beechcraft 1900D
aircraft&#146;s higher consumption per hour.&#160;
Additionally, the average price per gallon of fuel increased 15% to
$1.98 in fiscal 2006 from $1.71 in fiscal 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft maintenance increased 36.7% due to
increased flying year-over-year.&#160; Block
hours increased 27.1%, and ASMs increased 31.2% from fiscal 2005 to fiscal
2006.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft rents increased 1.9% due to six Beechcraft aircraft brought on
line while three Metro aircraft were retired.&#160;
During fiscal 2006, a total of ten Beechcraft aircraft and four Metro
aircraft were leased compared to four Beechcraft and 14 Metro aircraft being
leased during fiscal 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The decrease in insurance and taxes was the
result of a property tax adjustment in fiscal 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Administrative and other expenses increased
20.1%, or $1.1 million, in fiscal 2006 over fiscal 2005.&#160; Credit card commissions increased $0.1
million and computer reservation system charges increased $0.2 million in
fiscal 2006 as a result of a 32.8% increase in passengers.&#160; In addition, Big Sky recorded $0.8 million in
expense associated with the return of non-operating Metro aircraft.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Fiscal 2006 contained a $2.5 million goodwill
impairment charge.&#160; The impairment was
determined by comparing the fair value of the intangible asset to the current
carrying value.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Holdings</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Holdings
Operating Expenses</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total
operating expenses in fiscal 2006 increased to $21.1 million from $5.7 million
in fiscal 2005, primarily due to $13.7 million in impairment and other charges,
consisting of an $8.9 million write-off of Holdings&#146; equity investment in its
Mesaba subsidiary and a $4.8 million charge associated with Holdings&#146; </font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">33</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='33',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\06-9742-1\task1193661\9742-1-ba-05.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Jun 27 14:19 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">guaranty
of Mesaba&#146;s facilities and ground lease for its facility at the
Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Consolidated
Operating Income</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Operating losses totaled $62.7 million in
fiscal 2006, as compared to operating income of $8.6 million in fiscal
2005.&#160; The Company&#146;s operating margin
decreased to (24.5)% in fiscal 2006 from 1.9% in fiscal 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Consolidated
Nonoperating Income</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nonoperating income (net) increased to $6.0
million for fiscal 2006 from $2.3 million in fiscal 2005.&#160; The increase is primarily due to increased
interest income as a result of higher rates earned on cash and investments and
a $1.8 million arbitration settlement with an investment advisor in the first
quarter of fiscal 2006.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Consolidated
Provision for Income Taxes</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company recorded a tax benefit of $13.8
million in fiscal 2006 compared to a provision for income taxes of $3.6 million
in fiscal 2005.&#160; The Company&#146;s blended
effective tax rate was (24.4)% in fiscal 2006, after the deconsolidation of
Mesaba&#146;s financial results from the Company&#146;s consolidated financial statements
as of October 13, 2005, the date of Mesaba&#146;s bankruptcy filing, as compared to
32.9% in fiscal 2005, which includes the financial results of Mesaba. In fiscal
2006, the Company booked a valuation allowance against its net deferred tax
assets of $3.6 million.&#160; The effective
tax rate would have been (30.8)% exclusive of the valuation allowance.&#160; During the first quarter of fiscal 2005, the
Company received verification of a final settlement with the Internal Revenue
Service concerning its examination of the Company&#146;s fiscal 1995 and 1996 income
tax returns.&#160; As a result of this
settlement, the Company reduced its income tax payable and tax provision by
$1.2 million.&#160; Without this adjustment,
the Company&#146;s effective tax rate would have been 43.8% in fiscal 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Fiscal
Year Ended March 31, 2005 Compared with Fiscal Year Ended March 31, 2004</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Earnings
Summary</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company reported net income of $7.4
million, or $0.35 per diluted share, for fiscal 2005, compared to $4.5 million,
or $0.22 per diluted share, in fiscal 2004.&#160;
Diluted weighted average common and potentially dilutive common shares
were 21.1 million and 20.6 million in fiscal 2005 and 2004.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Mesaba</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba
Operating Revenues</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total operating revenues increased 2.7% in
fiscal 2005 to $427.5 million from $416.3 million in fiscal 2004.&#160; The increase was primarily attributable to
incremental ground handling revenue due to Mesaba&#146;s increased ground handling
business in Minneapolis and Detroit.&#160;
This was partially offset by a 0.4% decrease in passenger revenue as the
reduction in Saab flying more than offset the incremental Avro flying year-over-year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">34</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='34',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\06-9742-1\task1193661\9742-1-ba-05.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Jun 27 14:19 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba
Operating Expenses</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total
operating expenses in fiscal 2005 increased 1.7% to $413.1 million from $406.1
million in fiscal 2004.&#160; The cost per ASM
decreased 2.2% to $0.135 from $0.138.&#160;
The following table compares components of operating cost per ASM for
the years ended March 31:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10,603</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.92%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(644</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.94%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(6.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.96%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.3</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.12%;">

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.4</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.98%;">

  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.4%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="24%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:24.5%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.54%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:8.42%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">413,077</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.54%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:8.38%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">406,162</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.54%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:8.38%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6,915</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.94%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.96%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.5</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 1.5pt .7pt;width:2.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#162;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.0</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 1.5pt .7pt;width:1.4%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#162;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Wages and benefits increased 5.6% to $140.9
million in fiscal 2005 from $133.5 million in fiscal 2004.&#160; Wages and benefits increased due to increased
ground handling wages from additional ground handling activity, increased wages
due to additional flying and the new pilots&#146; contract and increased costs
related to the 401(k) benefit plan.&#160;
These increases were slightly offset by lower health and dental expenses
resulting from improved experience.&#160;
Year-over-year comparisons were also affected by the one-time $2.7
million retroactive pilot compensation expenses in the prior year resulting
from the pilots&#146; contract signed in January 2004.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft maintenance, excluding wages and
benefits, increased 5.8% to $81.9 million in fiscal 2005 from $77.4 million in
fiscal 2004.&#160; Aircraft maintenance costs
increased primarily due to a 9.5% increase in Avro block hours in fiscal 2005
and repair costs incurred to continue to maintain the fleet as it ages.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft rents decreased 2.4% to $100.5
million in fiscal 2005 from $103.0 million in fiscal 2004.&#160; This decrease is attributable to four fewer
Saab aircraft in service year-over-year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Landing
fees decreased 6.1% to $10.0 million in fiscal 2005 from $10.6 million in
fiscal 2004.&#160; The decrease is primarily
attributable to the 7.1% reduction of Saab departures partially offset by
airport rate increases during fiscal 2005.&#160;
Although Northwest is responsible for the Avro landing fees for Mesaba&#146;s
operations, Mesaba pays several airports directly and Northwest reimburses
Mesaba for such payments.&#160; The
reimbursement from Northwest for these Avro landing fees was $3.5 million and
$3.8 million for the fiscal years ended March 31, 2005 and 2004, respectively,
and is recorded as both landing fees expense and passenger revenue in Mesaba&#146;s
condensed statements of operations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Insurance and taxes decreased 26.4% to $6.2
million in fiscal 2005 from $8.4 million in fiscal 2004.&#160; The decrease is primarily attributable to
fewer insured aircraft and a reduction in the rates charged for hull and passenger
liability insurance, as well as the recognition of property tax refunds of $0.7
million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Depreciation and amortization decreased 15.1%
to $13.8 million in fiscal 2005 compared to $16.3 million in fiscal 2004.&#160; The lower level of depreciation and
amortization resulted from reduced capital spending over the last several
years.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Administrative and other expenses increased
5.0% to $59.9 million in fiscal 2005 from $57.0 million in fiscal 2004
primarily due to increased outside services of $3.6 million related to
consulting and audit costs incurred to comply with the requirements of the
Sarbanes-Oxley Act and increased TSA fees.&#160;
In addition, the increase was due to costs associated with flight
cancellations of approximately $1.2 million.&#160;
</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">35</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='35',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\06-9742-1\task1193661\9742-1-ba-05.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Jun 27 14:19 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">These increased costs were offset by reduced
costs related to third party Saab ground handling of $1.1 million and pilot
training of $1.4 million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba
incurred fuel expenditures of $16.9 million, or 0.6 cents per ASM, in fiscal
2005 compared to $20.1 million, or 0.7 cents per ASM, in fiscal 2004. </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In accordance
with EITF Issue No. 99-19, <i><font style="font-style:italic;">Reporting Revenue Gross as
a Principal vs. Net as an Agent</font></i>, these costs are classified as a
reduction from revenue in Mesaba&#146;s condensed statements of operations.&#160; Mesaba&#146;s actual cost of fuel for the Saab
aircraft, including taxes and pumping fees, was 83.5 cents per gallon.&#160; These prices are fixed under the terms of the
ASA, thereby insulating Mesaba from fluctuations in the market price of
fuel.&#160; Northwest is responsible for all
fuel for Mesaba&#146;s Avro operations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Big Sky</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Big
Sky Operating Revenues</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total operating revenues decreased 8.5% to
$15.1 million in fiscal 2005 from $16.5 million in fiscal 2004 due to a
reduction in flying unprofitable routes, resulting in a $1.7 million decrease
in passenger revenue, partially offset by a $0.3 million increase in EAS
subsidies.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Big
Sky Operating Expenses</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total operating expenses in fiscal 2005
decreased 0.5% to $20.0 million from $20.1 million in fiscal 2004 primarily due
to the reduced flying year-over-year, which was offset by $1.0 million in costs
associated with the permanent grounding of four Metro aircraft:&#160; three due to the fleet transition from Metros
to Beechcraft 1900Ds and one due to significant aircraft damage.&#160; The following table compares components of
operating cost per ASM for the years ended March 31:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.54%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:8.38%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20,097</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.54%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:8.38%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(106</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 1.5pt .7pt;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.94%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(0.5</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:3.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.96%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">33.7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 1.5pt .7pt;width:2.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#162;&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">26.7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 1.5pt .7pt;width:1.4%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#162;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Wages and benefits decreased 4.3% primarily
due to a reduction in flying year over year which was partially offset by a
workers&#146; compensation reserve entry made in fiscal 2005 for outstanding open
claims.&#160; Fiscal 2005 also included
expenses associated with filling a key vacant position.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft fuel increased 8.3% despite the 19.3% reduction in flying due
to the average cost per gallon of fuel increasing to $1.71 from $1.30.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft maintenance decreased 27.2% to $2.4 million in fiscal 2005
from $3.3 million in fiscal 2004 primarily due to reduced flying.&#160; In addition, fiscal 2004 included fuel tank
repairs and engine rental expense associated with the Metro aircraft that did
not continue in fiscal 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft rents decreased due to the return of three Metro aircraft
during fiscal 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The increase in insurance and taxes was the result of a property tax
adjustment in fiscal 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='36',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\06-9742-1\task1193661\9742-1-ba-05.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Jun 27 14:19 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Administrative
and other expenses increased 34.8% in fiscal 2005 over fiscal 2004.&#160; Fiscal 2005 included $1.0 million of costs
associated with non-operating Metro aircraft, and fiscal 2004 included a refund
of security fees by the TSA in the amount of $0.2 million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Consolidated
Operating Income</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Operating income totaled $8.6 million in
fiscal 2005, as compared to $4.0 million in fiscal 2004.&#160; The Company&#146;s operating margin increased to
1.9% in fiscal 2005 from 0.9% in fiscal 2004.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Consolidated
Nonoperating Income</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nonoperating income (net) decreased to $2.3
million in fiscal 2005 from $4.4 million in fiscal 2004.&#160; The decrease is primarily due to the
government grant of $2.6 million in fiscal 2004, which was partially offset by
increased interest income of $0.6 million earned on the Company&#146;s investments
in fiscal 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Consolidated
Provision for Income Taxes</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The provision for income taxes decreased 9.1%
to $3.6 million in fiscal 2005 from $4.0 million in fiscal 2004.&#160; The company&#146;s blended effective tax rate was
32.9% in fiscal 2005 as compared to 46.8% in fiscal 2004.&#160; During the first quarter of fiscal 2005, the
Company received verification of a final settlement with the Internal Revenue
Service concerning its examination of the Company&#146;s fiscal 1995 and 1996 income
tax returns.&#160; As a result of this
settlement, the Company reduced its income tax payable and tax provision by
$1.2 million.&#160; Without this adjustment,
the Company&#146;s effective tax rate would have been 43.8% in fiscal 2005.&#160; The Company adjusts its effective tax rate
quarterly based on forecasted operating results in the fiscal year.&#160; The rate is affected principally by the level
of nondeductible expenses relative to projected taxable income.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Liquidity
and Capital Resources</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Unrestricted cash, cash equivalents and
investments decreased $60.1 million, or 35.2%, to $110.7 million at March 31,
2006 from $170.8 million at March 31, 2005, primarily due to the capital
contribution that Holdings made to Mesaba in connection with the ASA and a
$12.5 million decrease resulting from the deconsolidation of Mesaba on October
13, 2005, the date of Mesaba&#146;s bankruptcy filing.&#160; The Company&#146;s working capital decreased to
$85.9 million at March 31, 2006 compared to working capital of $105.3 million
at March 31, 2005.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Approximately $25.7 million, or 79.2%, of
Mesaba&#146;s accounts receivable balance as of March 31, 2006 consisted of $7.3
million in prepetition receivables which can be offset by prepetition
liabilities and $18.4 million in postpetition amounts due from Northwest.&#160; As of June 15, 2006, Mesaba had collected
$16.9 million of this March 31, 2006 postpetition balance from Northwest.&#160; Although, Northwest has been paying
postpetition receivables due to Mesaba in the ordinary course of business since
its bankruptcy, Mesaba&#146;s business is sensitive to events and risks affecting
Northwest.&#160; See previous bankruptcy
discussions and risks related to Northwest and Northwest&#146;s bankruptcy in &#147;Item
1.&#160; Business&#148; and &#147;Item 1A. Risk Factors.&#148;&#160; Mesaba&#146;s future liquidity will depend on the
reorganization plan it adopts, among other items.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Cash
Flows</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Big
Sky</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Cash flows (used in) provided by activities
at Big Sky were $(4.0) million for operating activities, $(0.2) million for
investing activities and $4.2 million from financing activities.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A summary of cash flow activity at Holdings
and Mesaba is presented below.&#160; To allow
for an accurate comparison, Mesaba&#146;s results of operations have been analyzed
for the entire fiscal year ended March 31, </font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">37</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2006 excluding the deconsolidation of Mesaba
from the Company&#146;s consolidated financial statements as of October 13, 2005,
the date of Mesaba&#146;s bankruptcy filing.&#160;
Mesaba&#146;s condensed financial statements on a stand-alone basis are
presented in Note 20 of the accompanying Notes to Consolidated Financial
Statements.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Operating
Activities</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consolidated</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash used in operating activities in
fiscal 2006 was $21.5 million, primarily due to a net loss of $82.8 million,
which was partially offset by impairment and other charges of $50.2 million and
depreciation and amortization of $8.1 million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash used in operating activities in
fiscal 2006 was $10.0 million, including net cash used in reorganization
activities of $7.0 million.&#160; Operating
activities were impacted by a $70.7 million net loss, an increase in accounts
payable and other of $47.2 million, depreciation and amortization of $12.2
million and a reduction in deferred income taxes of $11.2 million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Reorganization Activities</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash used in reorganization activities in
fiscal 2006 was $7.0 million, primarily due to legal and professional fees
incurred in the bankruptcy and reorganization of Mesaba.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Investing
Activities</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consolidated</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash provided by investing activities in
fiscal 2006 was $10.4 million.&#160; The
source of cash from investing activities was the net sales of short- and
long-term investments of $35.9 million.&#160;
The uses of cash were $7.1 million for the funding of an irrevocable tax
trust that Mesaba formed as a part of its bankruptcy planning and purchases,
primarily of Mesaba property and equipment, of $6.5 million (prior to Mesaba&#146;s
deconsolidation on October 13, 2005).&#160;
The Company recorded a $12.5 million decrease in cash and cash
equivalents from the deconsolidation of Mesaba as of October 13, 2005, the date
of Mesaba&#146;s Chapter 11 bankruptcy filing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash used in investing activities in
fiscal 2006 was $11.9 million.&#160; The
source of cash from investing activities was the net sales of investments of
$3.0 million.&#160; The uses of cash were the
$6.8 million for the funding of an irrevocable tax trust that Mesaba formed as
a part of its bankruptcy planning and purchases of property and equipment of
$8.1 million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Financing
Activities</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consolidated</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash used in financing activities in
fiscal 2006 was not significant.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash provided by financing activities in
fiscal 2006 was $22.2 million which was due to the $31.7 million capital
contribution made by Holdings in September 2005 in connection with the ASA and
pursuant to Holdings&#146; separate agreement with Northwest.&#160; Of the $31.7 million total investment made by
Holdings, $22.2 million was paid in cash and $9.5 million was paid through the
transfer of certain short-term and long-term investments from Holdings.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">38</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='38',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\06-9742-1\task1193661\9742-1-ba-05.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Jun 27 14:19 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Outlook</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consolidated</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company has historically relied on cash
and cash equivalents, investments and internally generated funds (primarily
from Mesaba&#146;s operations prior to Mesaba&#146;s bankruptcy and deconsolidation in
October 2005) to support its working capital requirements.&#160; Absent adverse factors outside the control of
the Company, management believes current liquidity and funds from Holdings&#146; and
Big Sky&#146;s operations will provide adequate resources for meeting current
obligations through the end of fiscal 2007.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As Mesaba downsizes its fleet to a Saab-only
operation, its bankruptcy restructuring plan will require significant
reductions in labor and non-labor expenses.&#160;
Simultaneously, Mesaba is actively seeking debtor-in-possession
financing, but there can be no assurance that Mesaba will be able to obtain
such financing.&#160; If Mesaba is unable to
obtain debtor-in-possession financing or otherwise generate sufficient cash by
the end of the second quarter of fiscal 2007, Mesaba could be forced into
liquidation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Contractual
Obligations, Commitments and Off-Balance Sheet Arrangements</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Mesaba</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba leases its Saab aircraft, either
directly from aircraft leasing companies or through subleases with Northwest
under operating leases with initial terms of up to 17 years.&#160; Mesaba leases its Avro aircraft from
Northwest under operating leases with initial terms of up to ten years.&#160; Mesaba subleases its CRJ aircraft from
Northwest under operating leases with initial terms of ten years.&#160; Mesaba believes that its revenues from the
ASA will continue to be sufficient to fund its aircraft lease obligations.&#160; If the ASA terminates, then the Saab, Avro
and CRJ aircraft leases will simultaneously terminate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Additionally, because Northwest and Mesaba
have both filed for bankruptcy protection, both Northwest&#146;s and Mesaba&#146;s
aircraft-related lease obligations are impacted by Section 1110 of the
Bankruptcy Code.&#160; If Northwest, in its
bankruptcy, rejects certain leases for aircraft operated by Mesaba or alters
the fleet to be operated by Mesaba, Mesaba could reject the leases related to
such aircraft in its own Chapter 11 case.&#160;
As of March 31, 2006, Mesaba had rejected the leases for 11 Saabs leased
from Pinnacle.&#160; In June 2006, Mesaba
filed with the Bankruptcy Court a motion to reject an additional 12 Avros.&#160; As aircraft are removed from Mesaba&#146;s fleet
and leases are terminated, Mesaba will adjust its maintenance accruals for any
return conditions, write off any capitalized aircraft modifications that are
returned with the aircraft and record any estimated damage claim from the
rejected leases as a liability subject to compromise.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mesaba&#146;s airline fleet operating leases do
not contain any guaranteed lease residual provisions for which there would be a
potential contingency at the termination of the lease period.&#160; The following table summarizes Mesaba&#146;s
commitments to make lease payments for the years ending March 31, in thousands:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amounts
represent minimum lease payments with initial or remaining terms of more than
one year.&#160; See &#147;Item 8.&#160; Financial Statements and Supplemental Data,
Note 8 &#151; Leases&#148; for additional discussion of operating leases.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amounts are
based on lease terms, which have early terminations and extensions.&#160; The Saab leases have initial terms of up to
17 years with early terminations.&#160; While
the leases for 35 Avros had initial terms of up to ten years with extensions,
with aggregate monthly lease payments of approximately $5.3 million, the above
lease obligation amounts:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exclude amounts
associated with the 12 Avros idled and removed from the fleet by Northwest
during fiscal 2006; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exclude amounts
(except for $14.6 million in fiscal 2007) associated with the remaining 23
Avros that Northwest has informed the Company will be idled and removed from
the fleet by December 31, 2006.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">39</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='39',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\06-9742-1\task1193661\9742-1-ba-05.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Jun 27 14:19 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Shortly
after Northwest filed for bankruptcy, it unilaterally, and in breach of the
ASA, removed 12 Avros from Mesaba&#146;s flight schedule.&#160; Mesaba and Northwest then entered into a
written agreement under which Northwest acknowledged that Mesaba was not
required to make sublease payments on the idled aircraft.&#160; That agreement expired in February 2006.&#160; Mesaba chose to wait to reject the subleases
until it was confident that Northwest would not return the idled aircraft to
the flight schedule.&#160; In May 2006, Northwest
formally rejected the leases related to the 12 idled Avros.&#160; To ensure that Northwest&#146;s actions have
relieved Mesaba of all liability or obligations arising under the subleases, on
June 13, 2006, Mesaba filed a motion with the Bankruptcy Court to seek formal
approval of Mesaba&#146;s rejection of the 12 idled aircraft.&#160; Mesaba believes that under Section 503(b)(1)
of the Bankruptcy Code, which governs administrative claims, Northwest would
have no standing to assert an administrative claim against Mesaba for the
aircraft rent because Northwest had previously agreed that Mesaba had no
obligation to pay rent for grounded aircraft and because Mesaba parked and
protected the aircraft at Northwest&#146;s request.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Big Sky</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of March 31, 2006, Big Sky&#146;s fleet
consisted of 14 aircraft (ten active and four inactive) covered under operating
leases with terms of 17 to 56 months and aggregate monthly lease payments of
approximately $0.2 million.&#160; Big Sky
leases its aircraft from AirLift Inc. and from Mesa.&#160; Funding of the monthly minimum lease payments
is dependent on continued passenger boardings, Big Sky&#146;s operations and,
potentially, funding from Holdings.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Big Sky&#146;s airline fleet operating leases do
not contain any guaranteed lease residual provisions for which there would be a
potential contingency at the termination of the lease period.&#160; The following table summarizes Big Sky&#146;s
commitments to make long-term debt and lease payments for the years ending
March 31, in thousands:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:7.66%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1,847</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.2%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.54%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:7.68%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">524</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9,143</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

</table>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amounts
represent minimum lease payments with initial or remaining terms of more than
one year.&#160; See &#147;Item 8.&#160; Financial Statements and Supplemental Data,
Note 8 &#151; Leases&#148; for additional discussion of operating leases on non-idled
aircraft.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amounts are
based on lease terms, which have early terminations and extensions.&#160; The Beechcraft 1900D leases have initial
terms of up to five years with early terminations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amounts
represent principal payments only.&#160; See &#147;Item
8. Financial Statements and Supplemental Data, Note 9 &#151; Notes Payable and
Long-Term Debt&#148; for additional discussion of long-term debt and future
maturities.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">See &#147;Item 8.
Financial Statements and Supplemental Data, Note 8 &#151; Leases&#148; for additional
discussion of the capital lease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">40</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

Kentucky International Airport, Holdings is obligated under the facilities and
ground leases for such facility.&#160; The
following table summarizes Holdings&#146; guarantee to make lease payments for the
years ending March 31, in thousands:</font></p>
