<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.18</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="border:none;border-top:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">

<p style="border:none;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;padding:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

</div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">LETTER OF CREDIT REIMBURSEMENT AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Between</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">MAIR HOLDINGS,&nbsp;INC.</font></b>,</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">a Minnesota corporation</font></b></p>

  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">1</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.01 Issuance of Letter of Credit</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.02 Reimbursement</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.03 Letter of Credit Commitment
  Fees</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

  </td>

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">

  Security Documents</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.05 Changes in Law; Costs</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

 <tr>

 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">

  - AFFIRMATIVE COVENANTS</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">6</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.01 Preservation of Existence</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.02 Compliance with Laws</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.03 Inspection Rights</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.04 Keeping of Books</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.02 No Waiver</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.03 Right to Perform&nbsp;Company
  Obligation</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE&nbsp;IX
  - MISCELLANEOUS</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">11</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.01 Liability of the Bank</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.02 Permitted Contest</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.03 Savings Clause; Severability
  of Provisions; Governing Law</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.04 Headings</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.05 Amendments and Waivers</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.06 Addresses for Notices</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.4%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.07 Continuing Obligation</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

  </td>
 </tr>

  <td width="91%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:91.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.6%;">

  <td width="100%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:100.0%;">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='i',FILE='C:\JMS\sshaik\06-9742-1\task1131424\9742-1-ki.htm',USER='sshaik',CD='May 24 12:44 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THIS
LETTER OF CREDIT REIMBURSEMENT AGREEMENT</font></b>, dated as of April&nbsp;17,
2006, is by and between <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">MAIR HOLDINGS,&nbsp;INC.</font></b>,
a Minnesota corporation (the &#147;Corporation&#148;), and <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">FIRST
INTERSTATE BANK</font></b>, a Montana banking corporation (the &#147;Bank&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WITNESSETH:</font></b> </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>,
pursuant to a Guaranty Agreement dated July&nbsp;1, 1999, the Corporation
guaranteed the obligations of its subsidiary, Mesaba Aviation,&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;Mesaba&#148;),
with respect to those certain Kenton County Airport Special Facilities Revenue
Bonds, 1999 Series&nbsp;A, in the original amount of $14,000,000 (the &#147;Bonds&#148;);
and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS, </font></b>Mesaba filed for bankruptcy protection under
Chapter 11 of the United States Bankruptcy Code on October&nbsp;13, 2005, an
event of default under the ground lease associated with the issuance of the
Bonds; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS, </font></b>the Trustee for the bondholders,
UMB Bank, N.A. (the &#147;Trustee&#148;), declared all sums due under the Bonds
immediately due and payable, but agreed to forbear acceleration and payment on
the Bonds on the condition that the Corporation deliver a letter of credit for
the benefit of the Trustee; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS,</font></b>
to enhance the security for the payment obligations evidenced by the Bonds, the
Corporation has requested that the Bank issue an irrevocable letter of credit
in the form&nbsp;of <b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;A</font></u></b>
hereto (together with all replacements thereof and substitutions therefor, the &#147;Letter
of Credit&#148;), for the account of the Corporation in favor of the Trustee, in the
amount of $13,110,000.00 (the &#147;Letter of Credit Commitment&#148;);</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW,
THEREFORE,</font></b> in consideration of the above and in order to
induce the Bank to issue the Letter of Credit, the Corporation and the Bank
hereby agree as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;I</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">LETTER OF CREDIT FACILITY AND REIMBURSEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.01&#160; <u>Issuance of Letter of Credit</u>. </font></b>The
Bank agrees, on the terms and conditions hereinafter set forth, to issue the
Letter of Credit to the Trustee. The Letter of Credit shall expire by its terms
on April&nbsp;17, 2006, but the term shall be automatically renewable for
additional one year periods unless the Bank notifies the Trustee at least sixty
(60) days prior to the then current expiration date that the Bank has elected
not to renew the Letter of Credit. The date on which the Trustee has made the
final draw under the Letter of Credit (provided that such drawing is fully
honored up to the maximum amount available) is referred to as the &#147;Termination
Date&#148; of the Letter of Credit. The Corporation may&nbsp;make written request
that Bank not renew the Letter of Credit at least sixty (60) days prior to the
then current expiration date and Bank shall thereupon give notice of
non-renewal to the Trustee pursuant to this Article&nbsp;1.01 and the Letter of
Credit.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\JMS\sshaik\06-9742-1\task1131424\9742-1-ki.htm',USER='sshaik',CD='May 24 12:44 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.02&#160; <u>Reimbursement</u>. </font></b>The
Corporation hereby agrees to pay to the Bank <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;</font></b>on
demand, or in the absence of demand within one (1)&nbsp;business day (being any
day other than a Saturday, Sunday or public holiday or the equivalent under the
laws of the State of Montana) from the date of a draw under the Letter of
Credit, a sum equal to any amounts drawn under the Letter of Credit, together
with interest thereon from the date of a draw to the date of payment at a
variable per annum interest rate (computed on the basis of a year of 365 days)
equal to the Prime Rate (defined below) PLUS one percent (1%) per annum; and <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;</font></b>on demand, any and all reasonable charges and
expenses that the Bank may&nbsp;pay or incur relative to the Letter of Credit
and any and all reasonable expenses incurred by the Bank in enforcing any
rights under this Agreement. &#147;Prime Rate&#148; shall mean at any time the annual
prime rate of interest as published in &#147;Money Rates&#148; of the Money and Investing
Section&nbsp;of The Wall Street Journal, Western Edition (which is the base
rate on corporate loans posted by at least 75% of the nation&#146;s 30 largest
banks), adjusted as prime rate changes are announced, with the understanding
that the such Prime Rate is a base rate and serves as the basis upon which
effective rates of interest are calculated for those loans making reference
thereto, and as evidenced by the publication thereof in The Wall Street Journal
after its announcement in such internal publication or publications as said
largest banks may&nbsp;designate; provided, however, that Prime Rate shall mean
the equivalent or substitute Prime Rate published in The Wall Street Journal if
for any reason there is a change in the basis upon which the Prime Rate is
determined or if such Prime Rate is published in a different section&nbsp;of
such publication.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.03&#160; <u>Letter of Credit Extension Fees</u>. </font></b>The
Corporation hereby agrees to pay to the Bank with respect to the Letter of
Credit, an annual extension fee computed at the rate of one percent (1.00%) of
the maximum Stated Amount (as automatically reduced from time to time pursuant
to Exhibit&nbsp;A to the Letter of Credit) at the time such fee is calculated,
which shall be on each Reduction Date (as set forth in said Exhibit&nbsp;A). Said
extension fee shall be payable annually in advance. The initial annual
extension fee shall be payable on the date of issuance of the Letter of Credit
(&#147;Date of Issuance&#148;), and so long as the Letter of Credit remains issued and
outstanding, the annual extension fee shall be payable thereafter on each
annual anniversary of the Date of Issuance until the Termination Date.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.04&#160; <u>Security Agreement and Other Security
Documents</u>. </font></b>The obligations of the Corporation under this
Agreement, including without limitation the Corporation&#146;s obligation to make
payments of principal, interest, letter of credit commitment fees and other costs
and expenses under this Article&nbsp;I, are to be secured by, among other
things, the following, all in form&nbsp;and substance satisfactory to the Bank:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;</font></b>
an Assignment of Deposit Account, in the form&nbsp;of <u>Exhibit&nbsp;B</u>
attached hereto (together with all substitutions, replacements, amendments and
modifications thereof, the &#147;Pledge Agreement&#148;), to be executed and delivered by
the Corporation for the benefit of the Bank on the Date of Issuance, covering
cash deposits maintained at Bank in an amount which at all times is at least
one hundred percent (100%) of the maximum amount available to be drawn under
the Letter of Credit (the &#147;Deposits&#148; or the &#147;Collateral&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;</font></b>
any and all other documents, security agreements, financing statements or other
instruments which the Bank may&nbsp;determine, in its reasonable discretion,
are necessary to secure or</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\sshaik\06-9742-1\task1131424\9742-1-ki.htm',USER='sshaik',CD='May 24 12:44 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">preserve its lien or
security interest in the Collateral, or any other real or personal property
hereafter pledged as collateral for the Corporation&#146;s obligations hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
Pledge Agreement and other documents executed by the Corporation or any other
party to secure or guarantee the Corporation&#146;s obligations hereunder are
sometimes referred to herein as the &#147;Security Documents.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.05&#160; <u>Changes in Law; Costs</u>. </font></b>If
any change in any law or regulation or in the interpretation thereof by any
court or administrative or governmental authority charged with the
administration thereof shall either <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;</font></b>impose,
modify or deem applicable any reserve, special deposit or similar requirement
against letters of credit issued by the Bank or <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;</font></b>impose
on the Bank any other condition regarding this Agreement or the Letter of
Credit, and the result of any event referred to in clause (a)&nbsp;or (b)&nbsp;above
shall be to increase the cost to the Bank of issuing or maintaining the Letter
of Credit (which increase in cost shall be the result of the Bank&#146;s reasonable
allocation of the aggregate of such cost increases resulting from such events),
then, (i)&nbsp;within thirty (30) days of the Bank&#146;s obtaining knowledge of
such change in law, regulation or interpretation thereof, the Bank shall so
notify the Corporation and (ii)&nbsp;upon receipt of such notice from the Bank,
the Corporation shall immediately pay to the Bank all additional amounts that
are necessary to compensate the Bank for such increased cost incurred by the
Bank as a result of any event mentioned in clause (a)&nbsp;or (b)&nbsp;above,
and such amount submitted by the Bank to the Corporation shall be conclusive (absent
manifest error) as to the amount thereof; provided, however, that nothing
herein shall preclude the Corporation from objecting to the amount of any such
increased cost by appropriate proceedings if the Corporation has first paid to
the Bank the full amount thereof as calculated and submitted by the Bank.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.06&#160; <u>Expenses</u>. </font></b>The
Corporation hereby agrees to pay the Bank, on demand, any and all expenses,
including reasonable attorney&#146;s fees and legal expenses, incurred or paid by
the Bank in connection with <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;</font></b>the
preparation and negotiation of this Agreement and the instruments referred to
herein, <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;</font></b>the closing of the
transactions contemplated hereby, <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;</font></b>protecting
or collecting the Corporation indebtedness to the Bank under this Agreement, <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(d)&nbsp;</font></b>foreclosing against or otherwise enforcing any
collateral security therefor, <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(e)&nbsp;</font></b>protecting,
exercising or enforcing any or all of the Bank&#146;s rights and remedies against
the Corporation, including (without limitation) all reasonable fees and
disbursements of counsel for the Bank in any reorganization, insolvency, or
similar bankruptcy proceeding affecting the Corporation.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.07&#160; <u>Place and Manner of Payment</u>. </font></b>All
payments to the Bank by the Corporation hereunder shall be made in lawful
currency of the United States and in immediately available funds to the account
of the Bank at P.O.&nbsp;Box 30918, Billings, Montana 59116-0918,
Attention:&#160; Commercial Loan Department.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;II</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CONDITIONS PRECEDENT TO ISSUANCE OF LETTER OF
CREDIT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As
conditions precedent to the issuance of the Letter of Credit:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.01&#160; <u>Receipt of Documents</u>. </font></b>The
Bank shall have received, on or before the Date of Issuance, the following, in form&nbsp;and
substance satisfactory to the Bank:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;</font></b>
a favorable opinion of counsel to the Corporation, in substantially the form&nbsp;of
<b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;C</font></u></b> hereto, and as to
such other matters as the Bank may&nbsp;reasonably request;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;</font></b>
the executed Pledge Agreement along with appropriate, executed financing
statements, assignments, and other documents required thereunder;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;</font></b> an executed copy (or a
duplicate thereof) of the Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws of the
Corporation;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(d)&nbsp;</font></b>
an executed copy of the Resolutions of the Corporation authorizing the
transactions contemplated under and this Agreement; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(e)&nbsp;</font></b>
such other documents, instruments, approvals (and, if requested by the Bank,
certified duplicates of executed copies thereof) and opinions as the Bank may&nbsp;reasonably
request.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;III</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NATURE OF CORPORATION&#146;S OBLIGATIONS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">3.01&#160; <u>Obligation Unconditional</u>. </font></b>The
obligations of the Corporation under this Agreement shall be absolute,
unconditional and irrevocable, and shall be performed strictly in accordance
with the terms of this Agreement (except as the Corporation&#146;s obligations may&nbsp;be
modified by an action described in subparagraph (f)&nbsp;below), under all
circumstances whatsoever, including without limitation the following
circumstances:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;</font></b>
any lack of validity or enforceability of the Letter of Credit, or any other
agreement or instrument relating hereto or thereto (collectively the &#147;Related
Documents&#148;);</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;</font></b>
any amendment or waiver of, or any consent to departure from, the terms of all
or any of the Related Documents;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;</font></b>
the existence of any claim, set-off, defense or other rights which the
Corporation may&nbsp;have at any time against the Trustee or any beneficiary of
the Letter of Credit (or any persons or entities for whom any such beneficiary may&nbsp;be
acting), the Bank or any other person or entity, whether in connection with
this Agreement, the Related Documents or any unrelated transaction (but nothing
in this subsection&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;shall constitute a waiver by the Corporation
of any claim it may&nbsp;have against the Bank);</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(d)&nbsp;</font></b>
any statement or any other document presented under the Letter of Credit
proving to be forged, fraudulent, invalid, or insufficient in any respect
whatsoever (unless acceptance of or reliance upon any such statement or
document shall constitute gross negligence by the Bank);</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\JMS\sshaik\06-9742-1\task1131424\9742-1-ki.htm',USER='sshaik',CD='May 24 12:44 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(e)&nbsp;</font></b>
payment by the Bank under the Letter of Credit against presentation of a sight
draft or certificate that does not comply with the terms of the Letter of
Credit, provided that such payment shall not have constituted gross negligence
of the Bank; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(f)&nbsp;</font></b>
any delay, extension of time, renewal, compromise or other indulgence or
modification granted or agreed to by the Bank, with or without notice or
approval by the Corporation, in respect of this Agreement.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">3.02&#160; <u>No Other Obligations for Bank</u>. </font></b>Except
as specifically set forth herein or in the Letter of Credit, the Bank shall not
be obligated to issue any further credits, to cure any defaults under the
Bonds, or otherwise or in any other manner to extend any other financial
accommodations to the Corporation.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">3.03&#160; <u>Laws Governing Letter of Credit</u>. </font></b>The
Letter of Credit shall be governed by the Uniform&nbsp;Customs and Practice for
Documentary Credits (1993 Revision), International Chamber of Commerce
Publication No.&nbsp;500 or any subsequent revision thereof (the &#147;Uniform&nbsp;Customs&#148;),
and as to matters not covered by the Uniform&nbsp;Customs shall be subject to
and governed by the laws of the State of Montana.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;IV</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
Corporation represents and warrants as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.01&#160; <u>Organization</u>. </font></b>The
Corporation is duly organized as a corporation and is validly existing under
the laws of the State of Minnesota and is duly qualified to do business in and
is in good standing under the laws of Minnesota and any other jurisdiction in
which the conduct of its business or the ownership of its properties makes such
qualification necessary.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.02&#160; <u>Authorization and No Conflict</u>. </font></b>The
execution, delivery and performance by the Corporation of this Agreement, and
the instruments and documents executed in connection therewith are within the
Corporation&#146;s powers; have been duly authorized by all necessary action, do not
contravene <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;</font></b>the organizational
documents of the Corporation or <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;</font></b>any
law or contractual restriction binding on or affecting the Corporation; and
(except as provided in this Agreement) do not result in or require the creation
of any lien, security interest or other charge or encumbrance upon or with
respect to any of its properties.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.03&#160; <u>Documents Binding</u>. </font></b>This
Agreement, the Pledge Agreement, the Bonds, the other Security Documents and
all other instruments and documents executed by the Corporation in connection
therewith are the legal, valid and binding obligations of the Corporation,
enforceable against the Corporation in accordance with their respective terms,
except as such enforceability may&nbsp;be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency,
reorganization, moratorium or similar laws affecting</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\sshaik\06-9742-1\task1131424\9742-1-ki.htm',USER='sshaik',CD='May 24 12:44 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">creditors&#146; rights
generally and by general principles of equity (regardless of whether such
enforceability is considered in a proceeding in equity or at law).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.04&#160; <u>Litigation</u>. </font></b>Except
as provided in this Section&nbsp;4.04, there is no pending action or proceeding
before any court, governmental agency, or arbitrator against or directly
involving the Corporation and, to the best of the Corporation&#146;s knowledge,
there is no threatened action or proceeding affecting the Corporation before
any court, governmental agency or arbitrator which, as the Corporation is
reasonably able to foresee, may&nbsp;materially and adversely affect the
financial condition or operations of the Corporation. As has previously been
disclosed to the Bank, on October&nbsp;13, 2005, the Corporation&#146;s subsidiary,
Mesaba Aviation,&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;Mesaba&#148;) filed for bankruptcy protection under
Chapter 11 of the United States Bankruptcy Code. The Corporation is not
currently a party to Mesaba&#146;s bankruptcy proceedings, but it has received
notice from the Creditors&#146; Committee for Mesaba&#146;s bankruptcy that the committee
will be conducting an examination of the Corporation under Section&nbsp;2004 of
the United States Bankruptcy Code.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.05&#160; <u>Financial Statements</u>. </font></b>The
audited consolidated financial statements of the Corporation as of December&nbsp;31,
2005, which are publicly available in the Corporation&#146;s Quarterly Report on Form&nbsp;10-Q
filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on February&nbsp;9, 2006,
have been prepared in conformity with generally-accepted accounting principles
applied on a basis consistent with that of the preceding fiscal year (with
exceptions duly noted there), and accurately present the financial condition of
the Corporation, its subsidiaries, and affiliates as of such date and the
results of their operations for the period then ended, and since such date
there has been no material adverse change in their financial condition or
operations.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.06&#160; <u>Accuracy and Completeness of Information</u>.
</font></b>All information, reports, and other papers and data with
respect to the Corporation furnished to the Bank were, at the time the same
were so furnished, complete and correct in all material respects. No fact is
known to the Corporation that materially and adversely affects, nor is any fact
known on the date hereof that may&nbsp;in the future materially and adversely
affect, the business, assets or liabilities, financial condition, results of
operations, or business prospects of the Corporation that has not been set
forth in such information, reports, papers and data or otherwise disclosed in
writing to the Bank. No document furnished or statement made to the Bank in
connection with the negotiation, preparation, or execution of this Agreement
contains any untrue statement of a material fact or omits to state a material
fact necessary in order to make the statements contained therein not
misleading.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;V</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AFFIRMATIVE COVENANTS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As
long as the Termination Date has not occurred and as long thereafter as any
amount is due and owing to the Bank hereunder, the Corporation will, unless the
Bank shall otherwise consent in writing:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\JMS\sshaik\06-9742-1\task1131424\9742-1-ki.htm',USER='sshaik',CD='May 24 12:44 2006' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.01&#160; <u>Preservation of Existence</u>. </font></b>Maintain
its existence and remain qualified to do business in Minnesota and all other
jurisdictions where the nature of its business makes such qualification
necessary.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.02&#160; <u>Compliance with Laws</u>. </font></b>Comply
in all material respects with all applicable laws, rules, regulations and
orders of any governmental authority, such compliance to include, without
limitation, paying before the same become delinquent all taxes, assessments and
governmental charges imposed upon it or upon its property, except to the extent
compliance with any of the foregoing is then being contested as provided in Section&nbsp;10.02
hereof.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.03&#160; <u>Inspection Rights</u>. </font></b>At
any reasonable time, and from time to time and as may&nbsp;be reasonably
requested, permit the Bank or any agents or representatives thereof to examine
and make copies of and abstracts from the records and books of account of, and
visit the properties of, the Corporation.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.04&#160; <u>Keeping of Books</u>. </font></b>Keep
proper books of record and account, in which full and correct entries shall be
made of financial transactions and the assets and business of the Corporation
in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.05&#160; <u>Maintenance of Properties</u>. </font></b>Maintain
and preserve all of its properties that are material to the conduct of its
business in good working order and condition, ordinary wear and tear excepted.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.06&#160; <u>Reporting Requirements</u>. </font></b>Furnish
to Bank:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Notice
of Litigation</u>. Promptly after the commencement thereof, notice of all
actions, suits, and proceedings before any court or governmental department,
commission, board, bureau, agency, or instrumentality, domestic or foreign,
affecting the Corporation which, if determined adversely to the Corporation,
could have a material adverse effect on the financial condition, properties, or
operations of the Corporation.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>General
Information</u>. Such other information respecting the condition or operations,
financial or otherwise, of the Corporation as the Bank may&nbsp;from time to
time reasonably request.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.07&#160; <u>Environment. </u></font></b>Be and
remain in material compliance with the provisions of all federal, state and
local environmental, health, and safety laws, codes and ordinances, and all rules&nbsp;and
regulations issued thereunder.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.08&#160; <u>Notice of Defaults</u>. </font></b>Promptly
after the Corporation becomes aware, give notice to the Bank of <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;</font></b>any material adverse change in the financial
condition of the Corporation, <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;</font></b>any
default under Article&nbsp;VI of this Agreement of which the Bank would not be
expected to have knowledge and which might require the giving of notice before
becoming an Event of Default, and <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;</font></b>the
pendency or threat of any litigation or of any tax deficiency against the
Corporation, which,</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">if decided adversely to
the Corporation, could have a material adverse effect on its business, property
or financial condition.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.09&#160; <u>Further Actions</u>. </font></b>From
time to time, record, register and file all such notices, statements and other
documents and take such other steps as may&nbsp;be necessary or advisable to
render fully valid and enforceable under all applicable laws the rights, liens
and priorities of the Bank with respect to all security from time to time
furnished under this Agreement or the Security Agreement, or intended to be so
furnished, in each case in such form&nbsp;and at such times as shall be
satisfactory to the Bank, and pay all fees and expenses (including attorney&#146;s
fees) incident to compliance with this paragraph.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.10&#160; <u>Payment of Indebtedness</u>. </font></b>Subject
to the provisions of Section&nbsp;10.02 below, duly and punctually pay or cause
to be paid all principal and interest on each such indebtedness (including
lease obligations) of the Corporation to third parties; comply with and perform&nbsp;all
conditions, terms and obligations of the notes evidencing such indebtedness and
the security agreements, deeds of trust and mortgages securing it; promptly inform&nbsp;the
Bank of any default or anticipated default under any such note, security
agreement, deed of trust or mortgage; and forward to the Bank a copy of any
notice of default or notice of an event that might result in default under any
such note, security agreement, deed of trust or mortgage.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.11&#160; <u>Indemnification</u>. </font></b>Indemnify
and hold harmless the Bank from and against any and all claims, damages,
losses, liabilities, costs or expenses whatsoever that the Bank may&nbsp;incur
(or which may&nbsp;be claimed against the Bank by any person or entity
whatsoever) by reason of or in connection with <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;</font></b>any
breach by the Corporation of any representation, warranty or covenant contained
in this Agreement or any other instrument or document provided to the Bank in
connection herewith or <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;</font></b>the
execution and delivery or transfer (to a successor trustee) of, or payment or
failure to pay under, the Letter of Credit; provided that the Corporation shall
not be required to indemnify the Bank for any claims, damages, losses,
liabilities, expenses to the extent, but only to the extent, caused by (i)&nbsp;the
gross negligence of the Bank or (ii)&nbsp;the Bank&#146;s willful failure to pay
under the Letter of Credit after the presentation to it by The Trustee (or a
successor to whom the Letter of Credit has been transferred) of a sight draft
and certificate strictly complying with the terms and conditions of the Letter
of Credit. Nothing in this Section&nbsp;5.11 is intended to limit the
Corporation&#146;s reimbursement obligation contained in Section&nbsp;1.02 hereof.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.12&#160; <u>Performance by Corporation</u>. </font></b>Duly
and punctually perform&nbsp;all of its obligations under the Bonds and the
Pledge Agreement.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;VI</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NEGATIVE COVENANTS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">So
long as the Termination Date has not occurred or any amount is due and owing to
the Bank hereunder, unless the Bank shall otherwise consent in writing, the
Corporation agrees not to:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>
